Name: Ghost
Description: Ethereal and forgotten, ghostly beings seek to fulfill unfinished business or wander aimlessly, haunting the living realm.

Name: Human
Description: Versatile and adaptable, humans possess an unyielding spirit and boundless curiosity. They value freedom and individuality above all.

Name: Arcanium
Description: Magically infused gems imbued with the power of the arcane, used for payment of magical services and goods in the wizard realm.

Name: Health Potion
Description: Restores health by up to 100% of current health.
